alert.note: Alert for Southern Campbell (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 26 at 5:26PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Campbell County through 600 PM MDT... At 525 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 14 miles southeast of Powder River Rest Area, or 24 miles southwest of Gillette, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of west central Campbell County., southwest of Gillette. This includes Interstate 90 in Wyoming between Mile Markers 101 and 104. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
